target.description: Whether the applicant was admitted or denied by the iSchool Master’s Admissions Committee at the time.
target.name: Admission Decision

GRE Verbal Percentile.description: Percentile of the applicant’s GRE Verbal score.

GRE Quant Percentile.description: Percentile of the applicant’s GRE Quantitative score.

GRE Analytical Percentile.description: Percentile of the applicant’s GRE Analytic (Writing) score.

Tier of Undergraduate Institution.description: Tier 4 being top institutions and 1 being bottom. Primarily determined by aggregating several US News rankings

GPA.description: Upper level grade point average of the applicant, as calculated by their grades in senior level courses (e.g., typically taken in their third year and beyond if considering their bachelor’s experience)

Master's Held.description: Whether the applicant holds a master’s degree.

Doctorate Held.description: Whether the applicant holds a doctorate degree.

Bachelor's Held.description: Whether the applicant holds a bachelor’s degree or are in the final year of their bachelor’s program.

Special Degree Held.description: Whether the applicant holds a special degree.

Awards: Arts.description: The number of awards or honors that the applicant listed, related to the arts (e.g., creative writing, English, music, etc)

Awards: Scholastic.description: The number of awards or honors that the applicant listed, related to receiving scholarships or being holding top student rankings such as valedictorian.

Awards: Research.description: The number of awards or honors that the applicant listed, related to research experience such as independent study, research grants, or writing a thesis.

Awards: Service.description: The number of awards or honors that the applicant listed, related to service or volunteering.

Awards: Leadership.description: The number of awards or honors that the applicant listed, related to holding leadership positions.

Awards: Competitions.description: The number of awards or honors that the applicant listed, related to competitions or contests relevant to academia (e.g., hackathons, design contests, case competitions)

Gender.description: Applicant’s self-reported gender. Historically, this has been limited to two choices, male or female.

Ethnicity.description: Applicant’s self-reported ethnicity. Historically, this has been limited to five race/ethnicity categories.

First Generation.description: Inferred by the education level of an applicant’s parent(s), as reported on the application.

Work Experience.description: How many years an applicant has worked, defined by the time between the applicant’s earliest work start date and their most recent work end date
